name: Slidebean, Inc.
description: Developer of a presentation-building platform intended to simplify the process of making presentations. The company's platform utilizes artificial intelligence-powered online presentation tools to separate content from design and provides a fill-in-the-blank outline to create presentation workflows, enabling users to make a presentation by simply inputting information, regardless of their technical expertise or design skills.
